findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: Contract Owner is not able to stop or pause transactions

findings.title: OCTD - Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address
findings.description: Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address

findings.title: OTUT - Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: Contract Owner is able to transfer tokens from user's wallet

findings.title: ELFM - Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)

findings.title: ULTW - Contract Owner is not able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent
findings.description: Contract Owner is not able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent

findings.title: MT - Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens
findings.description: Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to burn tokens from specific wallet
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the capability to burn tokens from a specific wallet.

findings.title: BC - Contract Owner is not able to blacklist wallets from selling
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to blacklist specific wallets from selling.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.
